name: Sumo Ducks by ducktape
description:
2 ducks, 1 pool?

That's one duck too much. (Let the fight begin!)

Competitive multi-player, fast action, addictive game-play, we have it all all.

Generate some water waves to push the other duck to eternity.

credits: Michiel Van Dyck, Stef Colruyt, Anton Shumin, Dorin Sekula, Fons Bulens, Pieter-Jan Put, Pablo Schwilden, Martin Schmalzried, Ben Cornelius Tanghe, Maxime Quardon
